title: unable to connect
body:
i was searching for ARAM yesterday. i just found a match like always and we got our random champions. but when we get in loading page i was unable to connect and i saw this error: "unable to connect. please check your internet connection and try again"
i'm sure internet was connected. i tried several time and at last i could enter the game.
today i had same problem but after 40min still i cant enter to the game and i'm unable to connect loading page.

i just tried to open a ticked in riot support site but each time i try to login it show me this massage: "An unknown error has occurred. Please wait a minute or so before trying again."

anyone know whats the problem and how to fix?

replies.body:
Sounds like a block or something else is preventing you from reaching our services in and outside of League.  Configuring your DNS was a good start, though it's not a bad idea to rule out most possibilities by going through each step of that guide.  As an additional step, try our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  It has an option to auto-configure your firewall settings in case that's the cause of this.

If that fails, grab the logs from the HRT and reach out to us via support@riotgames.com.  This can work as an alternative to making a ticket.  I hope that helps!
i changed my IP and problem still exist. i also reconfigured my DNS settings as mentioned [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5) and it doesnt work for me.
